          <title>
            <string language="en">A broken bulb in series circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine unterbrochene Birne im Serie Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une ampoule cassée en série circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um bulbo quebrado em série circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lampadina rotta in serie circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας σπασμένος βολβός στο κύκλωμα σειράς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un bulbo quebrado en circuito de la serie</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that when the filament of one bulb breaks in a series circuit, the other bulb will not light.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">filament</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">series circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt daß, einläuft wenn der 
Heizfaden von einer Birne eine Serie, umkreisen Sie, die andere Birne 
beleuchtet nicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que quand le filament 
d'une ampoule enfonce une série circuitez, l'autre ampoule ne 
s'allumera pas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que quando o filamento 
de um bulbo quebra em uma série circuite, o outro bulbo não se 
iluminará.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che quando il 
filamento di una lampadina si rompe in serie giri intorno a, l'altra 
lampadina non si illuminerà.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι όταν δεν θα ανάψει η 
ίνα των σπασιμάτων ενός βολβού σε ένα κύκλωμα σειράς, ο άλλος 
βολβός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que cuando el filamento
de un bulbo adapta una serie circule, el otro bulbo no se encenderá.</string>
          </description>
